Title: Mijo
Writer: Vince Gilligan (created by), Peter Gould (created by), Peter Gould, Gordon Smith (staff writer)
Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn, Patrick Fabian
Plot: With his latest scam gone horribly wrong, Jimmy finds himself face to face with violent criminals, and is forced to talk his way out of a life-threatening situation.
